meta.note: Excluded from this campaign schema: Content production and platform production (e.g., video creation, blog posts, SEO), Non-digital and traditional media (e.g., TV, OOH, Radio, Print) as it's hard to measure traffic and revenue performance that occurs online, Non-measurable owned media without spend or performance metrics. This schema focuses on measurable digital marketing campaigns with identifiable spend, impressions, clicks, and conversions.

mapping_rules.retargeting_switch: If audience_targeting.retargeting == true → classify as RETARGETING; else → PROSPECTING.
mapping_rules.sem_split: For channel == SEM, use sem_keyword_type ∈ {brand,generic,competitor} as primary split; if RLSA is used, set retargeting=true.
mapping_rules.email_default: EMAIL typically maps to CRM/owned lists; retargeting flag may be ignored unless a paid audience extension is used.

nodes.skos_note: Root concept grouping all marketing communication channels under Paid, Owned, and Earned categories.
Channels where visibility is achieved through paid placements.
Channels owned and controlled by the brand (web, app, etc.).
Publicity or exposure earned organically without direct payment.
Search engine advertising (Google, Bing) with keyword bidding.
nodes.skos_scopeNote: Mapping: use sem_keyword_type (brand/generic/competitor). If audience_targeting.retargeting == true (RLSA), mark as retargeting scenario.

nodes.skos_note: Paid promotion within social platforms (Meta, TikTok, LinkedIn, Snapchat, X, Pinterest, etc.).
nodes.skos_scopeNote: Mapping: audience_targeting.retargeting == true → SOCIAL_RETARGETING; else → SOCIAL_PROSPECTING.

nodes.skos_note: Targeting new users/lookalikes with no prior interaction.
nodes.skos_scopeNote: Derived when audience_targeting.retargeting == false or missing.

nodes.skos_note: Targeting users who previously interacted with the brand (site visitors, engagers, cart abandoners).
Display/DSP inventory including banner, native, and non-social video (GDN, TTD, Criteo, Adform, Taboola, publisher direct).
nodes.skos_scopeNote: Mapping: audience_targeting.retargeting == true → DISPLAY_RETARGETING; else → DISPLAY_PROSPECTING.
Derived when audience_targeting.retargeting == false or missing.

nodes.skos_note: Performance partnerships (Awin, Rakuten, CJ, Tradedoubler, Amazon Associates).
Brand CRM email activities when counted as paid media (platform/sending costs).
nodes.skos_scopeNote: Mapping: typically CRM audiences; retargeting flag may be ignored.

nodes.skos_note: Paid collaborations with creators or media brands for sponsored or co-created content.
Brand-owned transactional platforms for direct purchases or conversions.
Non-paid visibility on search engines through content and technical optimization.
Brand reputation management and editorial exposure.
Unpaid influencer or UGC mentions without sponsorship.
